games.title: Neon Runner
games.descriptions: Dive into a chaotic underworld dungeon adventure with rogue-like mechanics, bullets everywhere, and permadeath that never gets old.
games.motivation: Dive into a chaotic underworld dungeon adventure with rogue-like mechanics, bullets everywhere, and permadeath that never gets old.

games.title: Stellar Drift
games.descriptions: Explore the cosmos in this open-world space sim. Build fleets, colonize planets, and wage galactic wars across procedurally generated universes.
games.motivation: Explore the cosmos in this open-world space sim. Build fleets, colonize planets, and wage galactic wars across procedurally generated universes.

games.title: Hollow Shadows
games.descriptions: A gothic metroidvania dripping with atmosphere. Uncover ancient secrets in a crumbling world where every corner hides danger and lore.
games.motivation: Dive into a chaotic underworld dungeon adventure with rogue-like mechanics, bullets everywhere, and permadeath that never gets old.

games.title: Iron Siege
games.descriptions: Real-time tactical warfare on a massive scale. Command armies, fortify bases, and crush your enemies in brutal multiplayer battles.
games.motivation: Dive into a chaotic underworld dungeon adventure with rogue-like mechanics, bullets everywhere, and permadeath that never gets old.

games.title: Verdant Realm
games.descriptions: A serene open-world RPG where you cultivate a living ecosystem. Craft, farm, and forge alliances with nature spirits.
games.motivation: Dive into a chaotic underworld dungeon adventure with rogue-like mechanics, bullets everywhere, and permadeath that never gets old.

games.title: Phantom Protocol
games.descriptions: Elite cyber-operative stealth thriller. Hack systems, ghost through enemy lines, and expose a global conspiracy one mission at a time.
games.motivation: Dive into a chaotic underworld dungeon adventure with rogue-like mechanics, bullets everywhere, and permadeath that never gets old.
